availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Beattyville, Lee County, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Married to Clarinda Blount on January 22, 1853. Father of George W. Blount, Josephine Blount, and James Blount. Physician in Lee County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Beattyville, p. 377. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Beattyville, p. 314. Blount (1821-1890)," Memorial #112393653, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112393653 (accessed October 5, 2018).
